#summary Chassis core service, supporting the storage, update, retrieval, deletion and query of arbitrary metadata for fine-grained research activities (studies)

This service is one of the [ArchitectureOverview Chassis core services].

This service supports the storage, update, retrieval, deletion and query of arbitrary metadata for fine-grained research activities, i.e., minor divisions of research activity within a data sharing network, typically known as studies.

Protocol/API specification: [StudyServiceAPI]

Implementation: StudyServiceImpl
